name: Madam Hien Apartment - h2hvietnam
address: No 2 Long Bien street, Long Bien District, Long Bien District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Offering an outdoor pool, Madam Hien Apartment - h2hvietnam is situated in Hanoi, 1.7 km from Old City Gate. Dong Xuan Market is 1.9 km from the property. Free WiFi is featured .

Featuring a balcony, the air-conditioned accommodation has a dining area and a seating area with a cable flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a microwave. A fridge and kettle are also provided.

Madam Hien Apartment - h2hvietnam also includes a sun terrace.

Thang Long Water Puppet Theater is 2 km from Madam Hien Apartment - h2hvietnam. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 20 km from Madam Hien Apartment - h2hvietnam.
